sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {AddMealButton} from './AddMealButton'; import {MealPhoto} from './MealPhoto'; import styles from './Meal.module.css'; export function MealCardFull(props) { const {meal, onAdd, selectedMealId} = props; const { name, type, time, image, kcal, nutritions, recipe, ingradients } = meal; const {fat, carbs, protein} = nutritions; return (

{name}

Calories: {kcal} kcal

Prep Time: {time} min

Nutritions

fat={fat}g

carbs={carbs}g

protein={protein}g

Ingradients:

{ingradients}

Recipe

{recipe}

); } //TODO: Dopisać elementy nutritions, recipe, ingradients
